title: Almighty Boss, Beautiful And Dashing
alternative_title: Quan Neng Da Lao You Mei You Sa ; 全能大佬又美又飒
status: Quan Neng Da Lao You Mei You Sa ; 全能大佬又美又飒
description:
Description :
        Before rebirth, Qin Sheng suffered humiliation, was abandoned by her biological parents, and was used by the fake green tea daughter, and even died tragically at her hands! In this life, Qin Sheng is reborn, kicking the scum and abusing the best! Vests are fully opened, doing business! Retrieve everything that belonged to her in the previous life with strength! There is also a low-key big man who continues the previous relationship and exclusively pampers her! Let's see the happy revenge life of the career-oriented heroine after her rebirth!
